name: Single_Shot
display_help: A quick single shot from the Arachnos Sub-machinegun. Extremely accurate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

name: Pummel
display_help: You can smash your opponents in close combat with the butt of your sub-machine gun to deal minor smashing damage. Pummel has a high chance to disorient your foe for a brief time. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Burst
display_help: Quickly fires a Burst of rounds at a single target at long range. Damage is average, but the fire rate is fast. Can also reduce the target's defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

name: WS_Wide_Area_Web_Grenade
display_help: Launches a Grenade at long range from under the barrel of your Assault rifle. It explodes into a field of sticky webs which slow and can immobilize all foes within its radius. Recharge: Long
display_target_help: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.

name: Placate
display_help: Allow you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A successful Placate will also Hide you. This Hide is very brief, and offers no Defense bonus, but it will allow you to deliver a Critical Hit. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, they will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Long

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} has Placated you.

name: Crowd_Control

name: Frenzy
display_help: You can energize and lash out with your arms, causing both lethal and energy damage to all foes surrounding you. This attack also weakens the Defense of those struck. Damage: Heavy Recharge: Moderate
display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the {Powername}.

name: Omega_Maneuver
display_help: You may use the Arachnos Teleportation system to summon an Omega Bomb in the midst of your enemies. The Omega Bomb immediately sends out a short range psionic signal and hypnotic light display to draw the attention of those nearby, causing them to approach the device. Then it detonates, causing massive damage to all enemies in a wide radius. Damage: Superior Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Summon Omega Bomb: Ranged (Location Targeted AoE), Superior DMG (Smashing/Energy), Foe Disorient
